summary: The Empower Charter School Educators to Lead Act (S. 1795) amends the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to modify the program of grants supporting high-quality charter schools. The bill focuses on providing technical assistance to applicants, improving authorizing quality, and providing pre-charter planning subgrants to charter school developers led by experienced educators. It also adjusts funding allocation percentages and references to other subsections within the Elementary and Secondary Education Act.
